description:
Keep your dive mask clear and your vision sharp. This powerful anti-fog treatment lasts through several sessions and works in any water temperature or weather conditions ̶ and it won't scratch the lenses or damage the seals.

  • Concentrated gel treatment lasts for multiple dives
  • Safe for all glass and plastic lenses and won't harm silicone or rubber
  • For best results, pre-treat mask with Sea Buff™ Pre Cleaner
  • Use on dive/snorkeling masks only. Not suitable for swim goggles
name: Gear Aid Sea Gold Antifog Gel 1.25 oz
